AT.name: Crystareino
AT.description: Was wird der Held bewahren, was verlieren, nun, da er in diese mystische Welt beordert wurde? Wie immer trainiert der Protagonist eifrig mit seinem Lehrer Eppol, um ein ansehnlicher Held zu werden. Nach einer Trainingseinheit erscheint vor den beiden ein mysteriöses Licht und hüllt sie vollständig ein. In eine andere Welt beordert und verwirrt über die Situation, beginnen die beiden eine Reise, um einen Weg zurück in ihre Heimatwelt zu finden. Erschaffe den ultimativen Charakter, indem du 20 Klassen meisterst! Fülle die Leiste in rundenbasierten Kämpfen auf, um die Fähigkeit zu entfesseln, die nur ein Held besitzt; den Brave Burst. Während deiner Reise wirst du mehr als 20 über die Welt verstreute Charaktere treffen. Du kannst dich sogar mit Charakteren anfreunden, die nicht storyrelevant sind! Wenn du ein wahrer Held in einem Fantasy-RPG sein willst, denk daran, den Dorfbewohnern zu helfen, indem du verschiedene Nebenquests annimmst!

AU.name: Crystareino
AU.description: Suddenly summoned to a mysterious world, what will the hero protect and lose? As always, the protagonist is training hard with his teacher Eppol, in order to become a respectable hero. After a training session, a mysterious light appears in front of them, engulfing the two. Summoned to another world, the two are bewildered by the situation and begin a journey to find a way to get back to their home world. Create the ultimate character by mastering up to 20 classes! Fill up the gauge in turn-based battles to unleash the ability only a Hero has; the Brave Burst. As you travel, you will come across more than 20 characters scattered around the world. You can even befriend characters who are not relevant to the story! If you want to be a true hero in a fantasy RPG, don't forget to help the townspeople by accepting the various subquests!

BG.name: Crystareino
BG.description: Suddenly summoned to a mysterious world, what will the hero protect and lose? As always, the protagonist is training hard with his teacher Eppol, in order to become a respectable hero. After a training session, a mysterious light appears in front of them, engulfing the two. Summoned to another world, the two are bewildered by the situation and begin a journey to find a way to get back to their home world. Create the ultimate character by mastering up to 20 classes! Fill up the gauge in turn-based battles to unleash the ability only a Hero has; the Brave Burst. As you travel, you will come across more than 20 characters scattered around the world. You can even befriend characters who are not relevant to the story! If you want to be a true hero in a fantasy RPG, don't forget to help the townspeople by accepting the various subquests!

BE.name: Crystareino
BE.description: Soudainement invoqué dans un mystérieux monde, que protégera le héros et que perdra-t-il ? Comme toujours, le protagoniste s’entraîne d'arrache-pied avec son professeur Eppol, afin de devenir un héros respectable. Après une séance d'entrainement, une mystérieuse lumière apparaît devant eux, les engloutissant tous les deux. Invoqués dans un autre monde, les deux sont perplexes devant une telle situation et commencent un voyage à la recherche d'une manière de revenir dans leur monde. Créez le personnage ultime en maîtrisant jusqu'à 20 classes ! Remplissez la jauge dans des combats au tour par tour pour libérer la compétence que seul un Héros possède : l’Éclatement Vaillant. Au gré de vos voyages, vous rencontrerez plus de 20 personnages dispersés à travers le monde. Vous pouvez même vous lier d'amitié avec des personnages pas nécessairement pertinents à l'histoire ! Si vous voulez être un véritable héros dans un jeu de rôle fantastique, n'oubliez pas d'aider les habitants en acceptant des quêtes secondaires variées !

ES.name: Crystareino
ES.description: Atrapado de repente en un misterioso mundo, ¿qué tendrá que proteger nuestro héroe, y que podría perder en el intento? El protagonista, como de costumbre, está entrenandose duramente con su maestro Eppol, para convertirse en un verdadero héroe. Después de una serie de ejercicios, una extraña luz aparece delante de ellos absorbiendoles con su esplendor. Son arrastrados a otro mundo, donde los dos se ven involucrados en una aventura, tras la cual empezarán un viaje en busca del camino de vuelta a casa. ¡Crea el mejor personaje cambiando y aprendiendo mas de 20 clases! Llena el calibre durante los combates por turnos para dar rienda suelta a la habilidad que solo un héroe posee, el Brave Burst. Durante el viaje, encontrarás a más de 20 personajes esparcidos por el mundo. ¡Además podrás hacerte amigo de personajes que no forman parte de la historia! ¡Si quieres convertirte en un verdadero héroe en este juego de rol fantástico, no olvides ayudar a los ciudadanos acogiendo sus peticiones como subquest!

IT.name: Crystareino
IT.description: Catapultato all'improvviso in un mondo misterioso, cosa dovrà proteggere il nostro eroe e cosa rischia di perdere? Il protagonista sta, come sempre, allenandosi duramente con il suo maestro Eppol, per diventare un eroe rispettabile. Dopo una serie di allenamenti, una luce misteriosa appare davanti a loro risucchiandoli in un bagliore di luce. Attirati e richiesti in un altro mondo, i due vengono coinvolti in un'avventura al termine della quale si mettono in viaggio per ritrovare la via di ritorno ed essere reintegrati nel proprio mondo. Crea il miglior personaggio cambiando e apprendendo più di 20 classi! Riempi il calibro durante i combattimenti a turno per scatenare l'abilità che solo un eroe possiede, il Brave Burst. Durante il viaggio, incontrerai più di 20 personaggi sparsi per il mondo. Potrai persino diventare amico di personaggi non pertinenti alla storia! Se vuoi diventare un vero eroe in questo gioco di ruolo fantasy, non dimenticare di aiutare i cittadini accentando le loro richieste come subquest!

LT.name: Crystareino
LT.description: Suddenly summoned to a mysterious world, what will the hero protect and lose? You can even befriend characters who are not relevant to the story! If you want to be a true hero in a fantasy RPG, don't forget to help the townspeople by accepting the various subquests!

PT.name: Crystareino
PT.description: Subitamente transportado a um mundo misterioso, o que o herói irá proteger e perder? Como de costume, o protagonista está treinando duro com seu professor Eppol para se tornar um herói respeitável. Após uma sessão de treino, surge diante deles uma luz misteriosa, que os engole. Transportados para outro mundo e perplexos com a situação, os dois dão início a uma jornada para encontrar o caminho de volta ao seu mundo de origem. Crie o melhor personagem, dominando até 20 classes! Preencha a barra em batalhas de turno para liberar a habilidade que apenas um Herói possui; a Brave Burst. Enquanto viaja, você se encontrará com mais de 20 personagens espalhados pelo mundo. Você pode até mesmo fazer amizade com personagens que não são relevantes para a história! Se você quer ser um verdadeiro herói em um RPG de fantasia, não se esqueça de ajudar os moradores da cidade, aceitando suas várias subquests!

RU.name: Crystareino
RU.description: Что найдёт, что потеряет герой, внезапно призванный в загадочный мир? Наш протагонист, по своему обыкновению, упорно трудится под руководством наставника Эппола стремясь достичь статуса всеми уважаемого героя, как вдруг их окутывает вспышка света. Оказавшись призванными в чужой мир, сбитые с толку приключенцы отправляются на поиски пути домой. Создай совершенного героя, достигнув мастерства в двадцати классах! Во время пошаговых боёв заполни специальную шкалу и используй Порыв Отваги - уникальную способность доступную только Настоящему Герою. Более двадцати значительных персонажей ожидают на пути, но ты можешь завести друзей и среди тех, кто никакого отношения к твоей истории не имеет. И, как любому герою фэнтезийной ролевой игры, тебе выпадет возможность помочь местным жителям выполняя многочисленные побочные задания!

SE.name: Crystareino
SE.description: Suddenly summoned to a mysterious world, what will the hero protect and lose? As always, the protagonist is training hard with his teacher Eppol, in order to become a respectable hero. After a training session, a mysterious light appears in front of them, engulfing the two. SI.name: Crystareino
SI.description: Suddenly summoned to a mysterious world, what will the hero protect and lose? As always, the protagonist is training hard with his teacher Eppol, in order to become a respectable hero. After a training session, a mysterious light appears in front of them, engulfing the two. Summoned to another world, the two are bewildered by the situation and begin a journey to find a way to get back to their home world. Create the ultimate character by mastering up to 20 classes! Fill up the gauge in turn-based battles to unleash the ability only a Hero has; the Brave Burst. As you travel, you will come across more than 20 characters scattered around the world. You can even befriend characters who are not relevant to the story! If you want to be a true hero in a fantasy RPG, don't forget to help the townspeople by accepting the various subquests!

Fill up the gauge in turn-based battles to unleash the ability only a Hero has; the Brave Burst. As you travel, you will come across more than 20 characters scattered around the world. You can even befriend characters who are not relevant to the story! If you want to be a true hero in a fantasy RPG, don't forget to help the townspeople by accepting the various subquests!
